title: Coconut Mint Cilantro Chutney
directions: Place the coconut in a small bowl and pour the boiling water over it. Let sit while you prepare the remaining ingredients.

In a food processor or blender, blend all of the ingredients to a paste adding water if necessary, 1 tbsp (15 mL) at a time to keep the mixture flowing. Taste and adjust with more salt and lemon juice if needed. Keeps for 5 days, covered and refrigerated. Freeze for longer storage.
ingredients: 1 cup (250 mL) shredded dried, unsweetened coconut
1/2 cup (125 mL) cilantro leaves and small stems, packed
1 1/2-inch (1.3 cm) piece ofÂ ginger, peeled and smashed
